title: The Visioning
description: When Katie - an upper class army girl - sees a young, working class woman about to commit suicide, she intervenes and takes her home.As the two young women get to know each other, Katie tries to integrate Ann in her life, but secrets from her past, makes this a perilous taskThis book was converted from its physical edition to the digital format by a community of volunteers. You may find it for free on the web. Purchase of the Kindle edition includes wireless delivery.
author: Susan Glaspell
